title: 24: Big Block of Cheese Day
description: In the grand tradition of the West Wing, Gartenberg and Ritchie have put a 2-ton block of cheese out in the foyer of the podcast for any and all listeners who may be hungry — or have questions about Apple. (And we are absolutely making a mental list of those who are snickering, and even as we speak we are preparing appropriate retribution…!)
itunes:author: Michael Gartenberg, Rene Ritchie
itunes:subtitle: In the grand tradition of the West Wing, Gartenberg and Ritchie have put a 2-ton block of cheese out in the foyer of the podcast for any and all listeners who may be hungry — or have questions about Apple.
